title: Chapter 2 Exercise: Mutability
description: Demonstrate mutable vs immutable bindings by printing two lines showing x before and after mutation.

tests.name: prints before and after
tests.expected:
The value of x is: 5
The value of x is: 6

hints: Use `let mut x = 5;` to make x mutable.
Use println!("The value of x is: {x}"); to print the value.
